name: Before you realise
description:
Little blue cube has to fight against his enemies, but... without any weapons?!?!
Yes, but you forgot that little blue cube has something special.
He switches position with his closest enemy every 5 seconds....

C O N T R O L S : 
          -----Gameplay-----
          -A/D for left or right movement 
          -SPACE for jumping
          -----General-----
          -ESC for returning to Main Menu
          -R for restarting current level


U P D A T E :   

-----Added-----
          -Particles
          -Trails (for player and enemies)
          -Animation for "teleporter"


-----Major Changes-----
          -Colliders (of the world)
          -Reworked Level   3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 and 9

-----Minor Changes-----
          -Tutorial
          -Menu

!!! In Development !!!

(But feel free to give feedback)





By Finn Liry
